alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:32PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Teton County through 800 PM MDT... At 731 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Driggs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alta around 735 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Moose, Grand Teton, Phelps Lake and Leigh Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
